title: Traffic camera activity
summary: Counts of pedestrians and types of vehicles captured by traffic cameras
description: Busyness indices using traffic camera data to monitor flows of cars, pedestrians, cyclists, buses, and commercial vehicles for selected cities and regions of the UK. Experimental Statistics.
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/office-for-national-statistics

code_list.title: Traffic camera regions
code_list.summary: List of regions from which traffic camera data is collected

concepts.label: North East
concepts.description: Publicly available traffic cameras from https://netrafficcams.co.uk/map

concepts.label: London
concepts.description: Publicly available traffic cameras from Transport for London https://www.tfljamcams.net/

concepts.label: Greater Manchester
concepts.description: Publicly available traffic cameras from Transport for Greater Manchester https://tfgm.com/roads/live-traffic-cameras

concepts.label: Northern Ireland
concepts.description: Publicly available traffic cameras from Traffic Watch NI https://trafficwatchni.com/twni/cameras

concepts.label: Southend
concepts.description: Publicly available traffic cameras in Southend https://sbctraffic.southend.gov.uk/

concepts.label: Reading
concepts.description: Publicly available traffic cameras from travel Reading http://www.reading-travelinfo.co.uk/live-traffic-cameras.aspx

Seasonal Adjustment.description: SA = seasonally adjusted, NSA = non-seasonally adjusted

code_list.title: Activity type
code_list.summary: List of vehicle types and pedestrians identified by traffic cameras
